Developer Guide for Kafka Streams¶

This developer guide describes how to write, configure, and execute a Kafka Streams application.

Kafka’s Streams API is built for mainstream developers, making it simple to build stream processing applications, support a developer-friendly deployment, and serve a majority of commonly found use cases. This guide gives you an overview of the API with examples, configuration options, and demos.

  • Writing a Streams Application
  • Configuring a Streams Application
  • Streams DSL
  • Processor API
  • Data Types and Serialization
  • Interactive Queries
  • Running Streams Applications
  • Managing Streams Application Topics
  • Streams Security
  • Application Reset Tool
